text: Yusuf plueng jilet troh ubak pinto Meureumpok linto pinto ka teuhah Bajee ka beukah nibak rueng Yusuf Jitarek meupruk beunoe jireupah Jikheun bak lakoe aneuk ceulaka Peureumoh gata jikeumeung reupah Meukon tapeulop jih lam penjara Get jih tasiksa beupeudeh leupah Meunoe keuh bala buet darohaka
